name: @furtmoney/process-email
description: Lambda handler that processes inbound SES emails from S3

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typecheck && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node22 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.js --log-level=info
scripts.package: npm run build && mkdir -p build && (cd dist && zip -qr ../build/process-email.zip .)

author: Furt Money
